      • addFruit

        public int addFruit(java.lang.String fruitName,
                    double price,
                    int quantity,
                    java.lang.String origin)
        Method addFruit(). This method will add fruit into list fruit of the shop. This parameter use integer type to return the result. This method use: + Method add(): To add object into the ArrayList. + numberOfFruit: To count fruit. In this parameter have parameter:
        Parameters:
        fruitName - This parameter will get input of user and add into the list.
        price - This parameter will get input of user and add into the list.
        quantity - This parameter will get input of user and add into the list.
        origin - This parameter will get input if user and add into the list.
        Returns:
        numberOfFruit To count fruit in the list.
